column4: Hello, I've updated my compiz just yesterday and after that I am not getting the window frame (I really don't know what is the name of it --But I mean the one with close, minimise and etc on top right) Am using kde 3.5.9

Hello, I've updated my compiz just yesterday and after that I am not getting the window frame (I really don't know what is the name of it --But I mean the one with close, minimise and etc on top right) Am using kde 3.5.9
I had the same thing just about 2 hours ago...a reboot fixed it
I didn't do a thing to fix it, I updated rebooted, ran apt-get autoclean, annoyed that I broke somehting but on the next reboot it was all well again
